snippet.title: Marvel Avengers Battle For Earth Trailer (E3 2012)
snippet.description:
Marvel Avengers Battle For Earth Trailer (E3 2012). The game features 20 different characters including Avengers such as Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America and Thor, as well as other fan-favorite super heroes and super villains from the Marvel Universe ! Join us on Facebook : http://facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial !

Marvel Avengers Battle For Earth Trailer (E3 2012). Suscribe now to get the forthcoming gameplay trailers and videos !
